mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.*,decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt) sbzt2 from xmk_abgc t where 1=1 and sbthcd <=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt),shzt desc

select count(*) from xmk_abgc where 1=1 and sbthcd <=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'
mapper.update: update xmk_abgc set lxbm=#{lxbm},lxmc=#{lxmc},gydw=#{gydw},qdzh=#{qdzh},zdzh=#{zdzh},qzlc=#{qzlc},xzqhdm=#{xzqhdm}, xzqhmc=#{xzqhmc},gjxjnd=#{gjxjnd},lxjsdj=#{lxjsdj},yhlc=#{yhlc},xmnf=#{xmnf},xmtype=#{xmtype}, yhnr=#{yhnr},bz=#{bz} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select roadcode lxbm,roadname lxmc,min(roadstart) qdzh,max(roadends) zdzh,(max(roadends)-min(roadstart)) qzlc, substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6) xzqhdm, (select name from xtgl_xzqh where id=substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6)) xzqhmc,F044 gydwbm,F045 gydw, decode(max(substr(F026, 0, 4)), null, max(substr(F025,0,4)), max(substr(F026, 0, 4))) gjxjnd,F114 lxjsdj from JXJCK_2013.GPSROAD where substr(roadcode,1,1) in('G','S','X') and F048='1' and roadcode like #{lxbm} ||'%'
and F044 in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydwbm} ||'%' or parent like #{gydwbm} ||'%')
andROWNUM <=50 group by roadname,roadcode,F114,F044,F045 order by roadcode,min(roadstart)

select id,lxbm,lxmc,gydw,qdzh,zdzh,qzlc,xzqhdm,xzqhmc,gjxjnd,lxjsdj,yhlc,xmnf,xmtype,yhnr,bz from xmk_abgc where shzt='已审核' and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydwbm} ||'%' or parent like #{gydwbm} ||'%')
order by lxbm
mapper.update: update xmk_abgc set sbzt='已上报',sbsj=sysdate,sbbm=#{sbbm},sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id =#{id}
update xmk_abgc set shzt='已审核', shsj=sysdate,shbm=#{shbm} where id=#{id}
update xmk_abgc set sbthcd=(sbthcd+2) where id =#{String}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from xmk_abgc t where sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by shzt desc

select count(*) from xmk_abgc where sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'
mapper.sql:
and sbthcd <=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm like substr(#{gydw},1,instr(#{gydw},'00')-1) || '%'
and xzqhdm like substr(#{xzqhmc},1,instr(#{xzqhmc},'00')-1) || '%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
mapper.select: select sbzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,qzlc v_8,yhlc v_9,gjxjnd v_10,xmnf v_11 from xmk_abgc where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into xmk_abgc(id,gydwbm,gydw,xzqhdm,xzqhmc,lxbm,lxmc,qdzh,zdzh,qzlc,yhlc,gjxjnd,lxjsdj,yhnr,xmnf,bz,xmtype,tbsj,tbbmbm,sbthcd,shzt,sbzt) values(sys_guid(),(select id from xtgl_department where name=#{0}),#{0},#{1},#{2},#{3},#{4},#{5},#{6},to_number(#{6})-to_number(#{5}),#{8},#{9},#{10},#{11},#{12},#{13},'待上报',sysdate,#{tbbmbm},#{sbthcd},'未审核','未上报')
mapper.select: select shzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,qzlc v_8,yhlc v_9,gjxjnd v_10,xmnf v_11 from xmk_abgc where sbzt='已上报'

select count(*) from xmk_abgc where 1=1
and lxbm=#{lxbm}
and to_number(zdzh)>=to_number(#{qdzh})
and to_number(qdzh) <=to_number(#{zdzh})

select roadcode lxbm,roadname lxmc,min(roadstart) qdzh,max(roadends) zdzh,(max(roadends)-min(roadstart)) qzlc, substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6) xzqhdm, (select name from xtgl_xzqh where id=substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6)) xzqhmc,F044 gydwbm,F045 gydw, decode(max(substr(F026, 0, 4)), null, max(substr(F025,0,4)), max(substr(F026, 0, 4))) gjxjnd,F114 lxjsdj from JXJCK_2013.GPSROAD where substr(roadcode,1,1) in('G','S','X') and F048='1'
and F044 in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydwbm} ||'%' or parent like #{gydwbm} ||'%')
group by roadname,roadcode,F114,F044, F045 having
roadcode=#{lxbm}
and min(roadstart) <=to_number(#{qdzh})
and max(roadends) >=to_number(#{zdzh})

select count(*) sbthcd,sum(qzlc) qzlc ,sum(yhlc) yhlc from xmk_abgc where 1=1 and sbthcd <=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'

select count(*) sbthcd,sum(qzlc) qzlc ,sum(yhlc) yhlc from xmk_abgc where sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=#{sbthcd}
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhmc} or parent=#{xzqhmc})
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxjsdj like '%'||(#{lxjsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like #{lxbm}||'%'
and lxbm like #{bz}||'%'
